Package it.polimi.view

Class View

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.observer.Observable<PlayerChoice>
it.polimi.view.View
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observer<GameView>
Direct Known Subclasses:
RemoteView
public abstract class View extends Observable<PlayerChoice> implements Observer<GameView>
This class is used for the "View" part of the MVC pattern
